attributes.action: Stop the written and online press demonising cyclists.
attributes.additional_details: As a cyclists I get to see it on a daily basis on social media targeted campaigns from mainly the press to stir up hate against cyclists.
attributes.background: Stop the written and online press demonising cyclists and force social media companies to recognise the comments as they are which is hate.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding the content of media.
